text: @here After filling the form user is not receiving the email

Yeah seems about right. Did not think of the batch endpoint sending 100 records per request. Also realised that we won't update all 140k at a time but rather only active companies which are significantly less, so the rate limit won't be a problem at all. Thanks for the reply!
Why do I get this error in all my portals, I always see the error and have to check the console to make sure nothings broken, itâ€™s really annoying
Its an attempt to connect to a local dev server and I assume you don't have one running which results in a refused connection.  Most likely a false positive.

Ooh - that's interesting. Thanks for sharing.
